title: PaymentCard
description: Represents a physical token such as a plastic card that authorizes the Party identified on it to charge the cost of goods and services to an account.

billingAddress.description: The address to which account statements are sent.
billingAddress.title: PaymentCard.billingAddress schema

cardAssociationName.description: The name of the card association that manages the card networks to which the PaymentCard belongs, e.g., "MasterCard", "Visa".
cardAssociationName.title: PaymentCard.cardAssociationName schema

cardVerificationCode.description: A verification code printed on the back of the PaymentCard. At present, this is a three-digit number.
cardVerificationCode.title: PaymentMethod.cardVerificationCode schema

issueNumber.description: A number used by the issuing authority to uniquely identify the issue of the PaymentCard.
issueNumber.title: PaymentCard.issueNumber schema

nameOnCard.description: The name of the Party authorized to use the PaymentCard.
nameOnCard.title: PaymentCard.nameOnCard schema
